I cant help...listing to pedro the lion...and thinking of her...it is depressing..why i cant find the right one for me...
I cant help...listing to pedro the lion...and thinking of her...it is depressing..why i cant find the right one for me...

A man named Joe wanted to go visit his brother is Pittsburgh...He decides to take the train... He goes to the train station and sees a woman at the ticket counter with extremly large breasts...He cant help but stare...so he walks up to the counter and trys to play it cool...and says, "I would like 1 picket to Titsburg..." He apoligises and boards the train... Joe is bummed out and has a sad face on...he sits down..and the man in the seat next to him asks whats wrong...Joe replys with the story... the man sits and ponders that for a moment then replys.."some times i mean something and say another...like this morning..i meant to say to my wife...could you pass the salt?....but i said...YOU F*CKING B*TCH YOU RUINED MY LIFE...
Today i got a new hair cut...it is a short sides and a mohawk...hell ya...

Hello world its been a while but im still alive..barely, How are you doing? im doing swell thanks for asking! Tonight i went to church and hung out w/ alex and rachel-funtimes.. afterward we went out w/ Mr.Petit, Mrs. Petit, sherrif smelly, andrew, ed, pam, frank, my mom, me, rachel, and the man of the year Alex Petit..it was kool...except that well nothing was bad..

Whats up..i havent written in a longtime. Whats new? I just got back from westerville south high school...i am enrolled and im on the football team...Im happy about that.the coach was happy that im on the team they need some good experienced linemen...soo its all good

Jeez...it has been quite a while since i posted last since then i have started football at westerville south, a really sweet school-good people-good teachers- GREAT FOOTBALL!..ya were the best team in most of ohio-cant touch that. alex is seeing incubus w/ wetzel tonight at nationwide, it sounded fun but idk i cant take much of wetzel b4 wanting to kill him...but he is kool any way, us three..."the dyanimic duo" have hung out like 4 times this week and we are getting closer. we are all missing rachel smith a lot she is a great gir and we love her a lot. sherrif smelly-aka-jim, jimothy, james, butt face, and alex's little brother..either one works..is going into 6th grade..wow he is a crazy mofo..he is the ONLY one of my freinds brother that can hang out w/ us w/o being gay and a loser..sherrif is a pretty kool kiddie. we all like him most of the time. ima t church at like 5 30 sitting here waiting for the service to start..but it seems so far away so its pretty boring... Football... We have a great interior line..like one dude on the freshman team thats 6.5 and still grouwing hes a beast..some russian kid named Valadic is playing hes big..but ive never seen hmi play much. much im bored as hell..ed is here bye now
